name: status
description: Set a custom status for the bot.

options.name: playing
options.description: Sets a "playing ____" status for the bot.

options.name: game
options.description: The name of the "game" for the bot status.

options.name: watching
options.description: Sets a "watching ____" status for the bot.

options.name: watching
options.description: The entity being "watched" for the bot status.

options.name: listening
options.description: Sets a "listening to ____" status for the bot.

options.name: listening
options.description: The entity being "listened to" for the bot status.

options.name: streaming
options.description: Sets a "streaming ____" status for the bot.

options.name: name
options.description: The stream being "watched" for the bot status

options.name: url
options.description: A URL for the stream being "watched" for the bot status

options.name: playing
options.description: The "playing" text to go with the DND status.
